column3: We meet currently a problem to update offers using our API method SubmitOfferPackage from S24. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to get stock informations using our API method GetProductStockList from S15. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to get message for each product created using our API method GetProductPackageSubmissionResult from S15. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to update orders by API using ValidateOrderList. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to update and get orders using ValidateOrderList and GetOrderList by API. Our teams are mobilized to resolved this issue.
